product_name: REI  Traverse PowerLock Cork Women's Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The REI Traverse PowerLock trekking poles for women offer easy and reliable external locking mechanisms. These user-friendly poles provide steady traction on ice and rock surfaces.
